author: vladimirp
title: Cardanomics
description: How can we help the community to independently analyze & model economic relationships, incentives and trends in the Cardano financial space?
importance: Independent analysis of economic trends, scenarios and incentives will enhance system stability, educate stakeholders and provide new data
success: Full economic effects of current/future Cardano policies and design are clear. Models, studies and simulations are publicly available.
